scripts.prepare: node ./scripts/update_package_jsons.mjs && yarn workspaces foreach run prepare && workspaces-to-typescript-project-references --tsconfigPath tsconfig.json && prettier -w */tsconfig.json
scripts.docs: typedoc --out docs/dist && cd docs && yarn serve
scripts.formatting: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -p -v run formatting
scripts.formatting:fix: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -p -v run formatting:fix
scripts.test: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach --exclude @aztec/aztec3-packages --exclude @aztec/end-to-end -p -v run test
scripts.build: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --topological-dev --verbose --exclude @aztec/aztec3-packages --exclude @aztec/docs run build
scripts.generate: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --topological-dev --verbose run generate
